title: Maya Jama and Jamie Redknapp shoot hoops together as fans hope for romance
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Maya Jama uploaded a series of adorable photos and videos of her alongside A League Of Their Own co-stars Freddie Flintoff and Jamie Redknapp while at a basketball game on Thursday.

The 25-year-old British television and radio presenter took to Instagram to share the spirited moment she scored a basket in front of a screaming crowd.

Afterwards, Maya is seen throwing her hands up in celebration while she dances and claps along to the crowd chanting.

But it’s the chemistry between Jamie Redknapp and recently single Maya that’s catching people’s attention.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Maya posted a photo of the pair to Instagram in Munich on Wednesday.

Fans then began commenting about each star and their current relationship statuses.

One replied to the photo: ‘She’s single, Jamie’s single…’

While another commented: ‘Jama and Redknapp: next power couple’.

And another responded: ‘I ship Maya and Jamie.’

Who knows? They may be hitting things off while shooting on the road!

Maya Jama is currently shooting A League of Their Own (Picture: Darren Gerrish/WireImage)

Maya recently opened up about what it feels like to be recently single after her shock split from four year-long relationship with Stormzy.

Speaking to ES Magazine about dating again, the 25-year-old said: ‘No! I’m scared to date. I haven’t been single in so long, how the f**k do you flirt anymore?! I’ve been basically with my friends 24/7.’

She also opened up about what it’s like breaking up with someone while in the public eye.

Maya said: ‘I used to read magazines when I was little and see all these Hollywood people break up and they didn’t feel like real people,’ she explained.

‘And then when you’re in that position, you’re like, oh s**t, it’s very real. Everybody just sees it as entertainment. These things never last that long. People find something else to talk about.’

description: Maya Jama and Jamie Redknapp are currently shooting A League of Their Own and fans are hoping they get together.
